CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: javelin
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A heavy steel tip attached to a long wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against armored targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: kunai
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Originally a farming instrument, similar in use to a hand-shovel, the kunai is a multi-purpose tool useful in both ranged and melee combat.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone fasioned into an arrow head and lashed to a wooden shaft. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The arrow head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a plasteel head to maximize armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A streamlined stone designed to fly far and hit hard. Not particularly effective against armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A refined sling bullet made out of steel to enhance armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A highly-refined sling bullet made out of plasteel to maximize penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: venom arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A steel arrow head coated in a potent toxin.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: flame arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A steel arrowhead constructed like a cage to hold incendiary components for setting targets alight.
